short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customizable new tab extension with glass widgets and colorful background themes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Modern Glass Widget Theme-X Evolution 
A Beautiful, Customizable New Tab Experience

Transform your new tab page into a captivating and functional workspace with Mystic Tab. Enjoy 17 mystical backgrounds inspired by forests, galaxies, and more. The sleek, transparent overlay features modern glass widgets, customizable for opacity and blur.

Key Features:

Clock & Calendar: Display the date and time at a glance.
Search Bar: Quick web searches directly from your new tab.
Todo List: Easily add and track tasks.
Quick Links: Access your favorite websites instantly.
Notes & Music Player: Write notes and enjoy music, with 7 songs to choose from.
Game Corner: Redirects to CrazyGames.com for online multiplayer and single-player games.
YouTube Player & Image Gallery: Watch media and enjoy random scenic photos.
Pomodoro Timer & Calculator: Boost productivity with a timer and calculator.
Event Countdown: Track important events with customizable countdown timers.
New Features:

Profile Image: Personalize your tab with a profile image.
Full-Screen Mode: Open your new tab in full screen for an immersive experience.
YouTube Player: Stream live lo-fi music directly from YouTube.
Choose from themes like "Mystical Sky" and "Dream Forest," adjust dark mode, set notifications, and enjoy a fully customizable background theme. Mystic Tab combines style and functionality to make your new tab an enjoyable and productive space.
